levels.title: 303 Controller Button Test
levels.instructionEN:
Steps: Connected controllers.
    1. Try all buttons listed in the front panel.
    2. All buttons' behaviours are correct.
levels.instructionTW:
測試步驟－－ (手把必須連線)
    1.測試畫面上所列的所有按鍵。
    2.確認所有按鍵的行為皆正常。

levels.title: 307 Permission Manager Test
levels.instructionEN:
Case: Request permission
    Steps: 
        1.Press digital trigger button of right hand controller.
        2.Click yes to grant permission.
    Expected result: 
        Permission request dialog will show.
        
    Note: This map only has right controller
levels.instructionTW:
[Finch/MI6] 測試步驟－－  (手把必須連線且權限還沒請求過)
1. 按下板機要求權限
  預期結果：
    a. 按下板機會跳出要求權限的畫面 (要允許 VRTestApp 拍照及錄製影片嗎?)
    b. 有兩項權限要求 (1/2)
2. 按下拒絕
  預期結果：
    a. 跳出要求第二項權限的畫面 (要允許 VRTestApp 存取您的連絡人嗎?)
    b. 有兩項權限要求 (2/2)
3. 按下拒絕
  預期結果：
    a. 回到場景畫面
4. 按下板機要求權限
  預期結果：
    a. 按下板機會跳出要求權限的畫面 (要允許 VRTestApp 拍照及錄製影片嗎?)
    b. 有兩項權限要求 (1/2)
5. 按下允許
  預期結果：
    a. 跳出要求第二項權限的畫面 (要允許 VRTestApp 存取您的連絡人嗎?)
    b. 有兩項權限要求 (2/2)
6. 按下允許
  預期結果：
    a. 回到場景畫面
7. 按下板機要求權限
  預期結果：
    a. 不會跳出權限請求的畫面
    
    Note: This map only has right controller

levels.title: 308 Camera Texture Test
levels.instructionEN:
Case1: Start Camera
    Precondition: Make sure you already pass Permission manager test.
    Expected result: 
        Camera preview image show and update frequently. Camera device info is updated.
        Camera Texture will be cropped according to FOV.
        Clamped region of cropped texture will be black.
Case2: Stop Camera.
    Expected result: 
        Camera preview image stop and is hidden. Camera device info is hidden.
levels.instructionTW:
[Finch/MI6] 測試步驟－－  (手把必須連線且 Camera 權限已請求過)
1. 按下 Start Camera
 預期結果：
   a. 畫面上出現 Camera 兩眼的灰階影像，其右側顯示相機影像的資訊
   b. Camera 影像會按FOV 被裁切
   c. Camera 影像裁切後被 Clamp 的部份會被塗成黑色
2. 按下 StopCamera
 預期結果：
   a. Camera的影像及資訊皆消失

levels.title: 309 Battery Status Test
levels.instructionEN:
Case: Get battery status event
    Precondition: NA
    Step: 1. Launch test case map
              2. recenter to connect controller
    Expected result :
        When HMD is connect, HMD battery percentage will be show.
        When controller is connect, controller battery percentage will be show.
        
        Note: This map is not controlled by interaction mode.

BatteryStatus_Test
[Finch] 測試步驟－－  (手把必須連線)
預期結果：

    b. 畫面上出現左手電量顯示 not available

[MI6] 測試步驟－－  (手把必須連線)
預期結果：

levels.title: 311 Teleport Controller Test
levels.instructionEN:
Steps:
    1. Take one step right.
    2. Point your controller toward a plate which you want to go.
    3. Press right-hand controller Trigger button.
Expected Result:
    You will teleport to the center of the plate you pointed.
Steps:
    Do the same thing like above steps, but press left-hand controller Trigger button.
Expected Result:
    You will teleport to the center of the plate you pointed. And a red rectangle right in front of you.
levels.instructionTW:
1.向右跨一步並且用控制器指向要傳送過去的板子，按下右手Trigger按鈕。
    預期結果: 傳送到板子上且在正中央。
2.向右跨一步並且用控制器指向要傳送過去的板子，按下左手Trigger按鈕。
    預期結果: 傳送到板子上且在正中央，一個紅色方塊立刻出現在你的正前方。

levels.title: 101 Recenter
levels.instructionEN:
Yaw_Only:
    1. Take off HMD, and remember where you standing at and the direction you faced in REAL WORLD. Then Put on HMD.
    2. The user can step away from the graph of coordinates (0,0,0) and turn 90 degrees at random.
    3. Press the "Red" button.
  ExpectedResult:
    1. The panel should be in front of the user. The icon of the coordinate (0,0,0) is still at a distance.
	2. Put down the controller and observe if the hand model at the right position.
	3. [Optional] Observe if the Tracker at the right position.

YawAndPosition:    
    1. Take a step back.
    2. User can step away from the graph of coordinates (0,0,0) and turn 90 degrees at random.
    3. Press the "Green" button.
  ExpectedResult:
    1. The panel should be in front of the user. The icon of the coordinate (0,0,0) is on the user's foot or head.
 	2. Put down the controller and observe if the hand model at the right position.
	3. [Optional] Observe if the Tracker at the right position.

Position:
	1. Step away from the graph of coordinates (0,0,0).
	2. Press the "Orange" button.
  ExpectedResult:
    1. The icon of the coordinate (0,0,0) is on the user's foot or head.
 	2. Put down the controller and observe if the hand model at the right position.
	3. [Optional] Observe if the Tracker at the right position.

RotationAndPosition:
    1. Lying down and look up.
	2. Press the "Blue" button.
  ExpectedResult:
    The panel should be in front of your sight.

Disable:
    Press the "Yellow" button then back to the coordinate (0,0,0) of the icon. 
  ExpectedResult:
    You should be at the position while you enter the test.
levels.instructionTW:
測試步驟：
Yaw_Only:
    user 在站定的位置做記號, 並記下面對的方向, 戴上HMD, user 跨一步離開座標(0,0,0)的圖示, 隨意轉90度, 按“ 紅色 ” 按鈕。
  預期結果：
    此時面板應轉到user正前方, 座標(0,0,0)的圖示仍在一步距離之外。
	放下控制器出現手模型，確認手模型位置是否正確。
	[可選的]如果有Tracker，請確認Tracker位置是否正確。
YawAndPosition:
    延續上面測試,座標(0,0,0)的圖示仍在一步距離, 隨意轉90度, 按“ 綠色 ” 按鈕。
  預期結果：
    此時面板應轉到user正前方, 座標(0,0,0)的圖示則正在user的腳或頭上。
	放下控制器出現手模型，確認手模型位置是否正確。
	[可選的]如果有Tracker，請確認Tracker位置是否正確。
Position:
    跨一步離開座標(0,0,0), 隨意轉90度, 按“ 橘色 ” 按鈕。
  預期結果：
    面板不會在user正前方，但座標(0,0,0)的圖示需正在user的腳或頭上。
	放下控制器出現手模型，確認手模型位置是否正確。
	[可選的]如果有Tracker，請確認Tracker位置是否正確。
RotationAndPosition:
    延續上面測試, User 仰起頭, 按“ 藍色 ” 按鈕。
  預期結果：
    此時面板應轉到user視線的正前方。
Disable:
    延續上面測試, 按“ 黃色 ” 按鈕，走向座標(0,0,0)圖示和面板所在的位置。
  預期結果：
    取下HMD, 則user所在應和測試前標記的位置和方向接近。

levels.title: 312 Resource Test
levels.instructionEN:
Test Steps:
1. See the left widget and check "Resource of current system language".
2. Summon quick menu and go to launcher then navigate to "Settings" -> "General" -> "Language" and set "Deutsch". Then back to this test scene.
3. Swich back to the language you desired after checking the result.
4. Check "Resource of preferred language which had been set".
5. See the right widget named "Get string by language and country value" and check the three pairs of the string in blue and the string in orange.

[Expect Result]
1. Show the correct system language. "English", "繁體中文" and "简体中文" are supported.
2. Show "Sorry, only support tw, en, cn language !!!!!".
4. Show the corresponding resource strings of <eng,US>, <zh,TW> and <zh,CN>.
5. The orange string and the blue string which above the orange string should be the same except the part of <language,country>.
levels.instructionTW:
測試步驟：
1. 看左邊的表格並且檢查"Resource of current system language"欄位。
2. 透過quick menu回到Launcher並且移動到 "設定" -> "一般" -> "語言" 並設定語言為 "Deutsch"。然後回到此測試場景。
3. 確認結果後請自行換回想要的語言。
4. 檢查 "Resource of preferred language which had been set"。
5. 看右邊的"Get string by language and country value"表格並檢查三對藍色和橘色字串。

預期結果：
1. 顯示正確裝置語言設定。目前支援 "English", "繁體中文" and "简体中文"。
2. 顯示 "Sorry, only support tw, en, cn language !!!!!"。
4. 顯示 <eng,US>, <zh,TW> and <zh,CN> 相對應的字串。
5. 除了<language,country>的部分，橘色字串與其上的藍色字串應為相同字串。

levels.title: 314 Interaction Mode
levels.instructionEN:
Interaction Mode Test
  Test 1: [Controller Mode]
    a. The controller model will appear when a controller is connected.
    b. Only one controller model has a beam.
    c. You can press the trigger button to switch the controller beam.
    d. The Touchpad / Trigger / Thumbstick buttons are available in Controller mode.
    e. The cube will change color when being clicked.
  Test 2: [Gaze Mode]
    a. A reticle will appear.
    b. The Touchpad / Trigger / Thumbstick buttons are available (depends on the device) in Gaze mode.
    c. Timer+Button: The cube will change color when being gazd or clicked.
    d. Button: The cube will change color when being clicked.
    e. Timer: The cube will change color when being gazed.
  Test 3: [Supports Natural Hand]
    a. The hand model appears when you put your hands in front of the Camera.
    b. Both hands will have the beam and pointer.
    c. The cube will change color when being pinched.
    d. The pointer will change color when pinching.
levels.instructionTW:
測試步驟－－
  測試 1: [Controller Mode]
    a. 手把連線後會顯示手把模型。
    b. 只有一支手把具有射線。
    c. 可以按 Trigger 鍵來切換射線。
    d. 可接受 Touchpad / Trigger / Thumbstick 三個按鍵輸入 (視裝置而定)。
    e. 方塊被點擊時會變色。
  測試 2: [Gaze Mode]
    a. 會顯示凝視光圈。
    b. 可接受 Touchpad / Trigger / Thumbstick 三個按鍵輸入 (視裝置而定)。
    c. Timer+Button: 方塊被凝視或點擊時會變色。
    d. Button: 方塊被點擊時會變色。
    e. Timer: 方塊被凝視時會變色。
  測試 3: [Supports Natural Hand]
    a. 當你把手放到攝像機前面，將會顯示手的模型。
    b. 雙手都具有射線。
    c. 對準方塊並「捏住」時方塊會變色。
    d. 光點在「捏」這個手勢時會變色。

levels.title: 201 Screenshot Test

Screenshort Test

levels.title: 202 Foveation Test
levels.instructionEN:
Steps:
1. Mode should be "Default" in the begining, no effect if press
 any parameter setting button.And now press "Mode : Enable".
2. Press "PeriperalQuality:Low" on the left side, and -1,-1 on the left side.
  ExpectedResult:
  The upper right region of your left eye will become fuzzy.
3. Pess "PeriperalQuality:Medium" on the left side.
  ExpectedResult:
  The fuzzy region of your left eye will become clearer.
4. Press "PeriperalQuality:High" on the left side.
  ExpectedResult:
  The fuzzy region of your left eye will become much clearer.
5. Press 1,1 on the left side.
  ExpectedResult:
  The fuzzy region of your left eye move to bottom left.
6. Press 60(degree) on the left side.
  ExpectedResult:
  The fuzzy region of your left eye become bigger.
7. Repeat 2, but the buttons on the right size.  
  ExpectedResult:
  The upper right region of your right eye will become fuzzy.
8. Repeat 3, but the buttons on the right size.  
  ExpectedResult:
  The fuzzy region of your right eye will become clearer.
9. Repeat 4, but the buttons on the right size.
  ExpectedResult:
  The fuzzy region of your left eye will become much clearer.
10. Repeat 5, but the buttons on the right size.
  ExpectedResult:
  The fuzzy region of your right eye move to bottom left.
11. Repeat 6, but the buttons on the right size.
  ExpectedResult:
  The fuzzy region of your right eye become bigger.
12. Press "Foveation is enabled?" button let it show "False"
  ExpectedResult:
  Both two eyes can not see any fuzzy region.
Note: "Mode : Disable" will disable all foveation feature at any time. 
There is no effect if you press any parameter setting button.
levels.instructionTW:
[Finch/MI6] 測試步驟－－  (手把必須連線)
1.一開始Mode應為Default，按任何鍵都不會有作用。
接下來按下"Mode : Enable"。
2.按下左邊那排的"PeriperalQuality:Low"，以及左邊那一排的-1,-1。
  預期結果:
  左眼的右上方會呈現模糊顆粒狀。
3.按下左邊那排的"PeriperalQuality:Medium"。
  預期結果:
  左眼的右上方模糊顆粒程度變輕微。
4.按下左邊那排的"PeriperalQuality:High"。
  預期結果:
  左眼的右上方模糊顆粒程度變更加輕微。
5.按下左邊那排的1,1。
  預期結果:
  左眼的模糊顆粒區域變成左眼的左下方。
6.按下左邊那排的60(度)
  預期結果:
  左眼模糊區域變大。
7.重複2，但皆改為右邊那排。  
  預期結果:
  右眼的右上方會呈現模糊顆粒狀。
8.重複3，但改為右邊那排。
  預期結果:
  右眼的右上方模糊顆粒程度變輕微。
9.重複4，但改為右邊那排。
  預期結果:
  右眼的右上方模糊顆粒程度變更加輕微。
10.重複5，但改為右邊那排。
  預期結果:
  右眼的模糊顆粒區域變成右眼的左下方。
11.重複六，但改為右邊那排。
  預期結果:
  右眼的模糊區域變大。
12.按下"Foveation is enabled?"按鈕後顯示False。
  預期結果:
  兩眼皆看不到模糊顆粒區域。
注意: "Mode : Disable" 將會在任意時間取消所有Foveation作用。
此時按下任何調整參數鍵皆無作用。

levels.title: 203 Splash Screen Test
levels.instructionEN:
Splash Screen Audo Loading Test
    Test1:
        1. Press the button "Enable Auto Loading".
        2. Press the button "Reload Level".   
      ExpectedResults:
            Vive logo shows.
    Test2:
        1. Press the button "Disable Auto Loading".
        2. Press the button "Reload Level".  
      ExpectedResults:
            Vive logo does not show.

Splash Screen Force Show Test
    Step:
        Press the other buttons such as "Size Scale", "Move Left Lower"
, "Center", "Move Right Upper", "Yello", "Red", "Black", "No BG" to set config of splash screen.
      ExpectedResults:
            The settings of Splash Screen will be kept and apply the pressed config.
levels.instructionTW:
[Finch/MI6] 測試步驟－－  (手把必須連線)
1.按下 Splash Auto Loading按鈕。下方顯示AutoLoad is (true)。
2.按下 Reload Level。
  預期結果:
  出現藍色Vive logo。
3.按下按鈕Size Scale:1 / Size Scale:0.5 / Size Scale:0.1。
  預期結果:
  每按一個按鈕Vive logo都會出現並且依數字比例越來越小。
4.按下按鈕Move Left Lower / Center / Move Right Upper。
  預期結果:
  每按一個按鈕Vive logo都會出現並且顯示在 左下/中央/右上。
5.按下按鈕Yellow / Red / Black / No BG。
  預期結果:
  每按一個按鈕Vive logo都會出現並且替換背景顏色 黃色/紅色/黑色/透明。

levels.title: 205 Render Mask Test
levels.instructionEN:
RenderMask Test
[Test case1: RenderMask (Option by Global Settings 2)]

[Test case2: RenderMask (Option by Local Settings Enable 1)]
    1. Press the "Red" button.
[Test case3: RenderMask (Option by Local Settings Disable 0)]
    1. Press the "Yellow" button.
 
ExpectedResult:
    1. Visible green color RenderMask on the Scene is
 decide by EnableRenderMask value is 2 or 1 in WaveVR_Pawn.
    2. Invisible green color RenderMask on the Scene is

levels.instructionTW:
RenderMask測試

1.按“藍色”按鈕, RenderMask（測試預設值:啟用）。
  預期結果：
  1a.場景中可見綠色的RenderMask。
2.按“紅色”按鈕, RenderMask（手動設置:啟用）。

levels.title: 102 Pose Predict Test
levels.instructionEN:
Case1
    1. Press the "Enable predict HMD rotation" button.
    2. Move left/right, up/down, forward/backword and look around.
Case2
    1. Press the "Disable predict HMD rotation" button.
    2. (Same as Case1)
Case3:
    1. Press the "Enable predict controller rotation& position" button.
    2. Move left/right, up/down, forward/backword.
    3. Look at the controllers.
    4. Rotate controller by different ways
Case4:
    1. Press the "Disable predict controller rotation& position" button. 
    2. (Same as C+H22ase3)
    3. (Same as Case3)
    4. (Same as Case3)

ExpectedResult:
    Case1.
        For remote rendering APP : you should find static objects are moving smoothly.
        For local rendering APP : You should not observe any abnormal like jitter or vibration.
    Case2.
        For remote rendering APP : you could find static objects are a little bit vibrating or slow motion.
        For local rendering APP : (Same as Case 1)
    Case3.
        For remote rendering APP : you should find the controllers are moving smoothly.
        For local rendering APP : (Same as Case 1)
    Case4.
        For remote rendering APP : you could find the controllers are a little bit vibrating or slow motion.
        For local rendering APP : (Same as Case 1)
levels.instructionTW:
[Finch/MI6] 測試步驟－－  (手把必須連線)
1.按下按鈕"Case 1 Enable predict HMD position"，任意移動環顧四周立方體。
  預期結果:
  無任何類似抖動破圖或震動的異常。
2.按下按鈕"Case 2 Disable predict HMD position"，任意移動環顧四周立方體。
  預期結果:
  無任何類似抖動破圖或震動的異常。
3.按下按鈕"Case 3 Enable predict controller rotation & position"，任意移動並觀察控制器。
  預期結果:
  無任何類似抖動破圖或震動的異常。
1.按下按鈕"Case 4 Disable predict controller rotation & position"，任意移動並觀察控制器。
  預期結果:
  無任何類似抖動破圖或震動的異常。

levels.title: 206 FadeOut Test

levels.title: 316 Pixel Density
levels.instructionEN:
1. Press buttons which PD value is less than 1.0.
Expect: Resolution change.  FPS might improved.

2. Press buttons which PD value is greater than 1.0.
Expect: Resolution is simular to PD=1.0.  FPS might deprave.

3. Press PD Auto button.  (Not for test)
Expect: Change PixelDensity every frame. For a while, app crash.

Warning: When PixelDensity changed too many times, app will crash.
This is Unreal's limitaion.  We only need to know if the 
PixelDensity will take effect in test case 1 and 2.  And should 
not do the pressure test like case 3.
levels.instructionTW:
1.按PD小於1的按鈕
預期結果: 解析度改變，FPS可能會提升
2.按PD大於1的按鈕
預期結果: 解析度約等於1.0狀態，FPS可能會下降
3.按PD Auto按鈕 (非測試)
預期結果: 不停的自動切換PD，久了會掛掉
警告：切換過多次會掛掉是Unreal的限制，視為正常現象，
1與2側項有效果即可，不應做壓力測試。

levels.title: 317 RenderDoc Sample
levels.instructionEN:
RenderDoc Feature in Wave's Project Settings must be enabled
before build this APK.  However the RenderDoc profiling tool
will impact the perforamce of normal test cases.  Therefore 
the RenderDoc is disabled by default.  In the common test, 
you cannot test this test case.

1. RenderDoc status shows "Available"
2. Open RenderDoc application on PC side, and Attach this 
   process.
3. Click "Capture Frame" button
   Expect: On PC side, a new captured frame appear after 1 second.

4. Click "Set Auto Capture Frame"
   Expect: On PC side, a captured frame increased after 3 seconds.
           And every 10 seconds, one captured frame increased.

5  After Step 4 for 23 seconds, click "Disable Auto Capture Frame".
   Expect: On PC side, the captured frame count no longer increased.
levels.instructionTW:
此項目必須在建置 APK前由開發者開啟RenderDoc功能，
會嚴重影響一般測試，因此預設是關閉的。
在一般測試中，無法測試此項目。

1. RenderDoc狀態顯示Available
2. 開啟RenderDoc PC端應用程式，並且Attach此Process。
3. 按下Capture Frame：
   Expect: 1秒後出現一個captured frame在PC端
   
4. 按下Set Auto Capture Frame：
   Expect: 3秒後出現一個Frame Capture在PC端，
           之後每十秒增加一個captured frame。

5. 步驟4經過23秒後，按下Disable Auto Capture Frame
   Expect: PC端不再增加captured frame

levels.title: 318 Natural Hand
levels.instructionEN:
NaturalHand Test Steps --
1. Gaze on the button to enable/disable the gesture or tracking.
2. After enabling the gesture, you can see the current gesture on back canvas.
3. After enabling the tracking, the simulated hand will be shown when you put your hand in front of the camera.
levels.instructionTW:
NaturalHand 測試步驟－－
1.凝視按鈕以開啟／關閉手勢 (Gesture) 或追蹤 (Tracking)。
2.開啟手勢後會在後方文字屏幕上顯示目前的手勢。
3.開啟追蹤後將手放在鏡頭前方，會顯示出模擬手掌。

levels.title: 319 PoseMode Test
levels.instructionEN:
Move controller's Thumbstick toward {left, up, right, down} and press down.
ExpectedResult:
Pose mode switch to {Raw, Trigger, Panel, Handle} and shows the against ShiftedPosition and ShiftedRotation.
levels.instructionTW:
將Thumbstick向 {左，上，右，下}移動並且按下
預期結果:
Pose切換為{Raw, Trigger, Panel, Handle}並且顯示相對應的ShiftedPosition和ShiftedRotation。

levels.title: 206 AMCMode Test
levels.instructionEN:
<b>This level is designed for low FPS.</>

<H2>UMC test step:</>
    1. Press AMC Mode::Off
    2. Press AMC Mode::UMC
<H2>Expection:</>
    1. FPS become lower than half refresh rate.
       For example, 45 or 37.
    2. Current AMC status shows "UMC".
       (Need pointer to the status text to help it update.)

<H2>SetFrameRate</> (<i>Only for Elite</>)
    If there are number buttons below, press any one will effect this application's 
    FPS limit.  No guarantee application can reach that FPS.  If you set a low FPS 
    and the FPS is still higher than the value you set, that might be a problem.

<H2>Note:</>
    The jitter reduce may not obvious since scene's loading is too heavy.
    PMC is not supported on Unreal platform.
    Don't try to use other buttons.
levels.instructionTW:
<b>本場景是以低FPS為目標設計的。</>

<H2>UMC測試步驟:</>
    1. 按 AMC Mode::Off
    2. 按 AMC Mode::UMC
<H2>預期結果:</>
    1. FPS變成低於二分之一refresh rate， 比如45 or 37.
    2. Current AMC status 顯示 "UMC"
       (需要指標移到狀態文字協助其更新)

<H2>SetFrameRate</> (只適用Elite</>)
    如果底下欄位有出現數字按鈕，按下任一個，會影響此App最大的FPS，但不保證可以達到。
	若設了比較低的數值，但是發現FPS仍然高過它，則有問題。

<H2>Note:</>
    抖動的減輕程度也許不明顯，因為場景本身負載很重。
    Unreal不支援PMC。
    <i>請勿測試其他按鈕，是測量工程用的。</>

levels.title: 320 DynamicFR Sample
levels.instructionEN:
A sample of Dynamic Foveated Rendering

DynamicFR can help increase FPS by applying more aggressive FR parameters when
HMD in a high motion.

This level is a sample to show how to make Dynamic FR.  Not afeature test.
Nothing here need to be proved.

The FR's parameters will be updated according to HMD's velocity and angular velocity.
When HMD's motion energy is high, lower the resolution. And when HMD's motion
energy is low, let the resolution back to normal.

If DynamicFR not work, please try disable AQ or enable FoveatedRendering.
levels.instructionTW:
Dynamic Foveation 的使用範例

這個場景不是測試場景。

Foveated Rendering的參數會隨著HMD的動態而改變。
當頭部的動態較高時，降低畫質，在頭部動態降低時，恢復畫質。

如果DynamicFR無法作用，請試著關閉AQ或允許FoveatedRendering。

levels.title: 207 Gamut Test
levels.instructionEN:
This test will only be tested by color expert.

Daily test is not necessary.
levels.instructionTW:
此場景只會被色彩專家測試。
日常測試是不必要的

levels.title: 321 StereoLayer Test
levels.instructionEN:
This test level is for verifying the functionality of Stereo Layers.

         To verify if Stereo Layers is functioning properly:
         1. There should be three panels with the same VIVE logo on them.
         2. The three panels should be positioned side by side and have the same size.
         3. The color of the images should be identical to one another.
         4. The overlay rendered on the left and underlay on the right should have a better visual quality than the panel rendered by Unreal in the middle.
         5. It is normal for the underlay on the right to have black borders and strange blending with the controller pointer and beam (controller model should occlude underlay).
         6. Push joystick toward left or right on your right controller to move the right panel.

         Note: Not all devices support Multi-Layer (Only supported in WVR Rendering Path)
levels.instructionTW:
這場景是為驗證Stereo Layers 功能而設。
         
         請參考以下細項以驗證Stereo Layers 功能正常：
         1. 場景中應有兩個平面，而個平面上顯示相同的VIVE logo.
         2. 三個平面大小相同且並排。
         3. 三個平面的顏色一致。
         4. 左邊的 Overlay 和右邊的 Underlay 畫質應比中間由Unreal 成像的平面好。
         5. 右邊 Underlay 有黑邊框以及和Controller pointer 跟 beam 重疊時有blending 問題屬正常現像。
         6. 左右推動右手控制器的搖桿去移動右側的Underlay圖片確認可以移動。

levels.title: 322 StereoLayer Test Widget
levels.instructionEN:
This test level is for verifying the functionality of Stereo Layers.

         To verify if Stereo Layers is functioning properly:
         1. There should be three panels with the same content on them.
         2. The three panels should be positioned side by side and have the same size.
         3. The color of the images should be identical to one another.
         4. The overlay rendered on the left and underlay on the right should have a better visual quality than the panel rendered by Unreal in the middle.
         5. It is normal for the underlay on the right to have a black background and strange blending with the controller pointer and beam (controller model should occlude underlay).
         6. Push joystick toward left or right on your right controller to move the right panel.

         Note: Not all devices support Multi-Layer (Only supported in WVR Rendering Path)
levels.instructionTW:
這場景是為驗證Stereo Layers 功能而設。
         
         請參考以下細項以驗證Stereo Layers 功能正常：
         1. 場景中應有兩個平面，而個平面上顯示相同的內容.
         2. 三個平面大小相同且並排。
         3. 三個平面的顏色一致。
         4. 左邊的 Overlay 和右邊的 Underlay 畫質應比中間由Unreal 成像的平面好。
         5. 右邊 Underlay 有黑邊框以及和Controller pointer 跟 beam 重疊時有blending 問題屬正常現像。
         6. 左右推動右手控制器的搖桿去移動右側的Underlay平面確認可以移動。

levels.title: 323 Frame Sharpness Enhancement Test
levels.instructionEN:
This test is for verifying the functionality of Frame Sharpness Enhancement.

    Steps:
        Press the buttons named 0.0 to 1.0 to change the sharpness level.

    ExpectedResult:
        The first line should show the level value against the button which just been pressed. The higher the level set, the more clear the text become.

    Note: Please skip this test if the project settings "Frame Sharpness Enhancement" hadn't been selected
levels.instructionTW:
此場景是為了驗證Frame Sharpness Enhancement功能而設。

    步驟:
        按下命名為0.0到1.0的按鈕去調整銳利程度。

    預期結果:
        第一行應顯示按下按鈕對應的數值。所設的數值越高，文字看起來越銳利。

	注意: 若"Frame Sharpness Enhancement"尚未選取請略過此場景。

levels.title: 324 Bracelet
levels.instructionEN:
Bracelet Test Steps --
1. Clicks "Start Tracker" or "Stop Tracker" button to enable/disable Tracker.
2. If you click "Wear Bracelet", the hand's position will follow the bracelet.
3. If you click "Doff Bracelet", the hand's position will NOT follow the bracelet.
4. If you click "Enable Hold", you can see the "Motion" text becomes "Hold" when you are holding.
5. You can see the information of bracelet in the front texts.
levels.instructionTW:
Bracelet 測試步驟－－
1.點選按鈕以開啟或關閉 Tracker 功能。
2.選擇 "Wear Bracelet" 之後，手會跟著手環移動。
3.選擇 "Doff Bracelet" 之後，手不會跟著手環。
4.點選了 "Enable Hold" 之後，當握槍從腰部拔出時，"Motion" 會顯示 "Hold"。
5.畫面上會顯示手環的各種資訊。

levels.title: 325 Passthrough
levels.instructionEN:
<b>Steps:</>
1. Press the Alpha value 0.0 to 1.0 one by one.
2. Press Alpha 0.7 then press the four buttons below <b>DelaySubmit and ShowIndicator</>.
   You should use <b>button A</> to hide Passthrough whenever press each button.
3. Make sure the Passthrough Overlay is hiding then press ShowUnderlay and HideUnderlay.
<b>Expection:</>
1. Passthrough will show in a few seconds and hide automatically. The Passthrough will 
   become obvious when the Alpha is closed to 1.0.
2. Passthrough will show. If DelaySubmit is ture, you will see the content become laggy;
   If ShowIndicator is true, you will see the indicator <b>R</> and <b>L</> in Passthrough 
   picture.   The Passthrough will hide immediately when you press the <b>button A</>.
3. The passthrough should show when press ShowUnderlay and hide when press HideUnderlay.
   The passthough underlay should not cover all the widgets.

<H2>Passthrough Image Quality</> (<i>Only for Elite</>)
<i>This is a global setting, and will effect other application.</>
Steps:  Press <b>High</>, <b>Medium</>, or <b>Low</> in <b>Quality</>
Expection:   When passthrough is ON, you can tell the quality different between 
             the 3 levels.

<H2>Passthrough Focus</> (<i>Only for Elite</>)
<i>This is a global setting, and will effect other application.</>
When you use <b>Hand</>, the passthrough's focus will follow your controller or hand (
if hand tracking is ON).  You may see the passthrough image is twisted around your hand.
When you use <b>Environment</>, the passthrough's focuse will behave like normal.

<H2>SetFrameRate</> (<i>Only for Elite</>)
If there are number buttons below, press any one will effect this application's FPS limit.
No guarantee application can reach that FPS.  If you set a low FPS and the FPS is still high, that might be a problem.
levels.instructionTW:
<b>步驟:</>
1. 按下Alpha值0.0到1.0。
2. 按下Alpha值0.7然後按下<b>DelaySubmit and ShowIndicator</>下方的四個按鈕。每按
   一個按鈕都要透過<b>按鈕A</>去隱藏Passthrough。
3. 確認Passthrough Overlay已經隱藏後，點擊ShowUnderlay和HideUnderlay。
<b>Expection:</>
1. Passthrough會顯示幾秒後自動隱藏。Passthrough會隨著Alpha數值越靠近1.0越來越明顯。
2. Passthrough會顯示。如果DelaySubmit為true，你會看到場景畫面變得延遲。如果
   ShowIndicator為true，你會在Passthrough畫面內看到標示圖<b>R</>及<b>L</>。
   當你按下<b>按鈕A</>，Passthrough會立即隱藏。
3. 當按下ShowUnderlay時Passthrough會顯示，按下HideUnderlay時Passthrough則隱藏。
   注意此時Passthrough不應遮蔽所有面板。

<H2>Passthrough Image Quality</> (只適用Elite</>)
這個是全域效果，其他app也會受到影響。</>
步驟: 按下<b>Quality</>中<b>High</>, <b>Medium</>, <b>Low</>其中一個。
期待: 當passthrough開啟時，你可以看出三種等級的畫質差異。

<H2>Passthrough Focus</> (<i>只適用Elite</>)
<i>這個是全域效果，其他app也會受到影響。</>
當你選<b>Hand</>時passthrough的焦點會跟隨你的控制器或是手(若有開啟手追蹤) 你可能
發現手附近的影像被扭曲。
當你選<b>Environment</>時passthrough的焦點並不會有任何變化。

<H2>SetFrameRate</> (只適用Elite</>)
如果有出現數字按鈕，按下任一個，會影響此App最大的FPS，但不保證可以達到。如果設了
比較低，但是發現FPS仍然很高則有問題。

levels.title: 326 Eye Tracking
levels.instructionEN:
Eye Tracking Test Steps --
1. The gaze pointer will move following your sight.
2. If "Simultaneous Interaction" is enabled, you can use controller/hand/gaze concurrently to interact with objects.
levels.instructionTW:
Eye Tracking 測試步驟－－
1.凝視光點會隨著視線而移動。
2.如果啟用 "Simultaneous Interaction"，你可以同時使用控制器、雙手以及視線凝視操控。

levels.title: 327 Facial Tracking
levels.instructionEN:
Facial Tracking Test --
1. You can see the face model in front of you.
2. You can see the Lip & Eye Expression values on the left or right panel.
levels.instructionTW:
Facial Tracking 測試－－
1.正前方可以看到臉部模型。
2.左右方可以看到 Lip 和 Eye Expression 的值。

levels.title: 325 Projected Passthrough
levels.instructionEN:
Step:
TestCase1: UE4.26 only. Hold left hand's trigger and move left hand controller.
           The controller moved area will become passthrough.
TestCase2: Choose "Square" or "Cuboid".  An passthrough area 
           will fixed on your left hand.  The width of the area will resized by time.
TestCase3: Change alpha value during test case 1 and 2.
           Should see virtual controllers or background when alpha is 0.5.
TestCase4: Turn off Projected Passthrough.  The passthrough area should gone.
levels.instructionTW:
步驟:
測試1: 按著左手Trigger並且移動左手控制器，控制器經過的區域會變成Passthrough。
測試2: 選擇使用方形或是方塊，會有一個Passthrough區域固定在左手上，
       會隨時間變動區域的寬度。
測試3: 在以上項目中修改Alpha值，半透明時，可從穿透區域看到虛擬的控制器或背景。
測試4: 關閉Projected Passthrough，穿透區域應該消失。

levels.title: 330 Anchor Test
levels.instructionEN:
<H1>Spatial Anchor test step:</>
1. Press any one of Create Anchor button.
2. A passthrough will show around your right hand controller.
3. Find the real world anchor object in passthrough.
4. Use <b>Right controller</> to attach the real world anchor object.
5. Then press <b>Thumbstick</> button to confirm.
6. Update all Anchors by Enumerate Anchors button.
7. Update current Anchors' state by Update button.

This test is duplicated in ScenePerception.
levels.instructionTW:
測試方法
A. 建立Anchor
  按下任一名稱的CreateAnchor按鈕。
  在Passthrough中找到現實世界中Anchor的位置。
  使用右手控制器，觸碰它並按下Thumbstick確認。
B. 清除系統中的Anchor
  按下Clean Anchor
按下更新Enumerate Anchor按鈕，列出現存的所有Anchor。
剛才新增的應該會在。觀察是否有在追蹤。
使用自動更新或按下Update按鈕，更新現有的Anchor狀態。

此測試與ScenePerception測試重複。可用作交叉測試。

levels.title: 331 Scene Perception Test
levels.instructionEN:
<H1>Only for Focus Elite</>
Before this test, you should create walls, door, windows, table, and Objects in
<b>MR Settings</>.  And you should also do the scene meshes scan.

Four major tests here: <b>Perception, Plane, Object, and Mesh.</>
    All functions need <b>Scene</> check box is enabled.  If not enabled,
    means this device does not supported <b>Scene</> feature.
<H2>Perception:</> Check <b>2D Plane</>, <b>3D Object</> and <b>Mesh</> checkboxes. 
If not allow to check, means not support.  If checked, you can use checked features.
<H2>Plane:</> Test if we can get planes defined by <b>MR Settings</>.  The 
    <b>Auto Update Plane</> is default enabled.  You should disable 
    <b>Auto Update Plane</> to test filter, load, and destroy.
<H2>Object:</> Test if we can get objects defined by <b>MR Settings</>.  The 
    <b>Auto Update Object</> is default enabled.  You should disable 
    <b>Auto Update Object</> to test load, and destroy.
<H2>Mesh:</> Before you test, you should scan scene meshes by <b>MR Settings</>.
	Choose a <b>Mesh Type</>.  <b>Collision</> will be looser than <b>Visual</>.
	Click <b>Get SceneMeshes</> to show the scene meshes.

This is not a Major test here, but you can still try:
<H2>Anchor:</>
    Please use the panel on the right.  Choose one of <b>Create Anchor</>
    , use left controller to locate a point, and then pull the left
    controller's trigger.  An anchor will be saved into system.  The 
    <b>Auto update</>is enabled by default.  you can try disable it to
    test <b>Clean (local)</>.  <b>Clean Anchor</>will delete the anchors
    from system.

<H2>Note:</> Due to controller beam is not designed well, please avoid two
    beams pointing to the panel at the same time.
levels.instructionTW:
<H1>只能在Focus Elite上測試</>
在測試之前，你應該先創造一些牆、桌面、窗以及門。並且掃描場景。

有四個主要測項：Perception、Plane、Object、以及Mesh。但所有功能都需要
    <b>Scene</>功能被勾選。如果<b>Scene</>無法勾選，代表機器可能不支援此功能。
<H2>Perception：</>勾選並且可以被勾選，才能使用Plane、Object、Mesh功能。
<H2>Plane：</>取得從MR Settings製作的平面。可套用過濾器取得對應的平面。
    預設開啟自動更新，關閉自動更新才能以手動方式呼叫讀取與刪除。
<H2>Plane：</>取得從MR Settings製作的物件。
    預設開啟自動更新，關閉自動更新才能以手動方式呼叫讀取與刪除。
<H2>Mesh：需先使用掃描程式建立Scene Mesh才能在此測試。Scene Mesh中<b>Visual</>的組成
    較複雜，<b>Collision</>的較簡單。點擊GetSceneMeshes，取得的會顯示出來。

非主要測項：	
<H2>Anchor：</>請使用右邊的面板。選一個Create Anchor，用左手控制器找個位置，按下
    Trigger。一個Anchor就會產生並存於系統。請小心不要在按Trigger時，同時
    按到面板，因為左右射線都會觸發面板上的功能。Destroy Anchor local可以
    清除場上的物件，但是自動更新會讀取回來。Destroy Anchor會清除現存於系統
    的Anchor。

注意：因為控制器射線設計問題，很難點到東西，請避免兩個控制器的射線都指在面板上。

levels.title: 332 Scene Perception Auto Run
levels.instructionEN:
<H1>Only for Focus Elite</>
Before this test, you should create walls, door, windows, and table. And you
should also do the scene meshes scan.  If you didn't have any anchor, go to 
<b>AnchorTest</> to create some.

Auto load all Scene Plane / Scene Object / Scene Meshe / Anchor.
Auto update all status.

This level is a demo level for developer.  Please use ScenePerceptionTest for 
regular test.
levels.instructionTW:
<H1>只能在Focus Elite上測試</>
在測試之前，你應該先創造一些牆、桌面、窗以及門。並且掃描場景。如果沒有Anchor，
請到<b>AnchorTest</>創造一些出來。

自動載入Scene Plane / Scene Object / Scene Mesh / Anchor。並且自動更新狀態。

這個是給開發者的示範場景。正規測試請用ScenePerceptionTest。

levels.title: 333 MarkerTest
levels.instructionEN:
<H1>Only for Focus Elite</>
Before this test, you need have some <b>printed ArUco markers</>.
Only support ArUco markers generated by <b>dictionary: 4x4 100</>.

First Time Test
Steps:
1. Check <b>Marker</>
2. Check <b>ArUco Observer</>
3. Check <b>ArUco Detecting</>
4. Look at your printed ArUco markers until detected.
   A green frame will appear.  And the marker's infomation will
   show in the list.  
5. In the marker's information, there are two checkers.
   Check the first checker to set it <b>Trackable</>
6. After set all trackable markers you need,
   Uncheck <b>ArUco Detecting</>
   You will see only trackable markers' infomation still exist in the list.
7. Check the second checker to <b>start tracking</> the marker.
8. You can move the marker to see if it moved.
9. You can leave this level after you tested.

Second Time Test
1. Check <b>Marker</>
2. Check <b>ArUco Observer</>
3. The previous trackable markers will show in the list without detection.
levels.instructionTW:
<H1>只能在Focus Elite上測試</>
在測試之前，你應該在真實世界準備<b>印好的ArUco Marker</>。
只支援由<b>dictionary: 4x4 100</>產生的ArUco Marker。

初次測試
Steps:
1. 勾選 <b>Marker</>
2. 勾選 <b>ArUco Observer</>
3. 勾選 <b>ArUco Detecting</>
4. 看著你印出來的ArUco Marker直到他們被偵測到。
   綠色的框會出現。而且列表中會出現Marker的資訊。
5. 在marker的資訊中，有兩個Checker
   勾選第一個checker將該Marker設為<b>可追蹤</>
6. 當你設完所有想追蹤的Marker後，取消勾選<b>ArUco Detecting</>。
   你會看到列表中只剩下可追蹤的Marker。
7. 勾選第二個checker將該Marker設為<b>追蹤中</>
8. 你可以移動你印出來的ArUco Marker看他是否會動。
9. 測試完可以離開測試場景

再次測試
1. 勾選 <b>Marker</>
2. 勾選 <b>ArUco Observer</>
3. 不須使用偵測，先前設為可追蹤的Marker就會出現在列表中。
